categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Runeer was the designation of a group of two Assassin-class corvettes under the service of the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. They were used by the Alliance as part of their first attack on Space Installation NL-1. But were destroyed by the stations defenses, which included Imperial Ace Maarek Stele.
These corvettes will appear only on the hardest difficulty setting of Battle 3 Mission 4.
